title: WFP assistance to resume Thriposha production
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The World Food Program (WFP) has agreed to provide assistance for the resumption of Thriposha production in the country.
Secretary to the Ministry of Health, Janaka Chandragupta stated that the discussions held with the representatives of the World Food Program with regard to this were successful.
Accordingly, steps will be taken to expedite the supply of raw materials including corn required for the production of Thriposha, which was earlier halted due to the shortage of raw materials.
Thriposha is given as a nutritional supplement required for infants, pregnant and lactating mothers.
